Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.drawables

Class BaseDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.drawables.BaseDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Box, Dot, Line, Text
    public abstract class BaseDrawable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    A base Drawable implementation, with a Style, retrieved with style(), and a DrawingPoint location, retrieved with at(). When the drawable is drawn with Drawable.draw(DrawingSurface), it then has a shape that can be retrieved with shape(). A copy of a drawable can be retrieved with copy() and the with*() functional methods can be used to create copies with new attributes.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
